## selectTemplate variable

Selects the pre-compiled handlebars template based on the key or returns undefined.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
selectTemplate: (aKey: string) => (aState: Record<string, HandlebarsTemplateState>) => HandlebarsProcessor
```
